name: Ninja Frogs
description:
The frog village needs your help to fight against evil mutant alligators.

★ Dash, dodge and land-kicks on heads in order to defeat your alligators enemies.
★ Jump into this thrilling game of ninja movements and magic scrolls power-ups.
★ Do the impossible to beat down the alligators spread out in your village.
★ Swap for a variety of ninja frog heroes with different missions and personalities.
★ Collect your rewards to buy new maps, new heroes and abilities.

Easy to learn, hard to master.
